AMm.caption: enable screen share
AMm.doc: Determines whether screen share is enabled. Options are yes and no.
AMm.name: screenshare

AMn.caption: enable chat
AMn.doc: Determines whether chat is enabled. Options are yes and no.
AMn.name: chat

AMo.caption: owner only broadcast
AMo.doc: Options are yes and no. If set to yes, only meeting owners are allowed to turn on camera, unmute mic, and share screen. You can configure a meeting owner token with the Daily - create meeting token action.
AMo.name: broadcast

AMp.caption: enable recording
AMp.doc: This feature is for Daily scale plan users only. Determines whether a recording is enabled on the call. Options are cloud,local,rtp-tracks,output-byte-stream
AMp.name: recording

AMq.caption: Room Name
AMq.doc: name of the room that you would like to configure.
AMq.name: name

AMr.caption: privacy
AMr.doc: Determines who can access the room.  Options are public and private
AMr.name: privacy

AMs.caption: enable knocking
AMs.doc: Turns on a lobby experience for private rooms. A participant without a corresponding meeting token can request to be admitted to the meeting with a "knock", and wait for the meeting owner to admit them. Options are yes and no.
AMs.name: knocking

AMt.caption: exp (unix timestamp)
AMt.doc: "Expires". This is a unix timestamp (seconds since the epoch.) Users cannot join a meeting in this room after this time. To convert a Bubble date format extract unix timestamps and divide by 1000
AMt.name: expires

AMu.caption: language
AMu.doc: The default language  for this room. Currently supported languages are de: German, en: English, fi: Finnish,  fr: French, nl: Dutch, pt: Portuguese, pl: Polish, sv: Swedish, es: Spanish, tr: Turkish, it: Italian, ka: Georgian, jp: Japanese, no: Norwegian, ru:Russian  user: Uses the browser's current language and defaults to English if not supported.
AMu.name: lang

AMv.caption: Use this action to update a room's privacy and config properties through Daily's API.
AMv.name: information

ANW.caption: meeting join hook
ANW.doc: Optional parameter to set a URL that will receive a webhook when a user joins a room.
ANW.name: meeting_join_hook

ANg.caption: nbf (unix timestamp)
ANg.doc: This is a unix timestamp (seconds since the epoch.) Users cannot join a meeting in this room before this time. To convert a Bubble date format extract unix timestamps and divide by 1000
ANg.name: notbefore

ANm.caption: To unlock the below parameters, you'll need to add a credit card to your account. Visit https://dashboard.daily.co/billing to learn more about pricing and add your credit card details.
ANm.name: scale_info

ANn.caption: The below are optional advanced room settings. To further configure the call experience.
ANn.name: advanced_info

AOr.caption: max participants
AOr.doc: How many people are allowed in a room at the same time. Default is 200. Contact help@daily.co if you need a limit above 200.
AOr.name: max_participants

AOs.caption: eject at room exp
AOs.doc: If there's a meeting going on at room exp time, end the meeting by kicking everyone out. This behavior can be overridden by setting eject properties of a meeting token.
AOs.name: eject_at_room_exp

APt.caption: enable people ui
APt.doc: Determines whether to display the People UI. When set to yes, a People button in the call tray reveals a People tab in the call sidebar. The tab lists all participants, and next to each name indicates audio status and an option to pin the participant. When enable people ui is set to no, the button and tab are hidden.
APt.name: enable_people_ui

APu.caption: enable prejoin ui
APu.doc: Determines whether participants enter a waiting room with a camera, mic, and browser check before joining a call.
APu.name: enable_prejoin_ui

APv.caption: video processing ui
APv.doc: Determines whether to display background blur controls. When set to yes, a participant can enable blur during a call.
APv.name: enable_video_processing_ui

AQu.caption: enable pip ui
AQu.doc: Sets whether the room can use Daily Prebuilt's Picture in Picture controls. When set to true, an additional button will be available in Daily Prebuilt's UI to toggle the Picture in Picture feature.
AQu.name: enable_pip_ui

AQv.caption: emoji reactions
AQv.doc: Determines if Daily Prebuilt displays the Emoji Reactions UI. When set to true, a Reactions button appears in the call tray. This button allows users to select and send a reaction into the call. When set to false, the Reactions button is hidden and the feature is disabled.
AQv.name: enable_emoji_reactions

AQw.caption: hand raising
AQw.doc: Sets whether the participants in the room can use Daily Prebuilt's hand raising controls. When set to true, an additional button will be available in Daily Prebuilt's UI to toggle a hand raise.
AQw.name: enable_hand_raising

AQx.caption: noise cancellation
AQx.doc: Determines whether Daily Prebuilt displays noise cancellation controls. When set to true, a participant can enable microphone noise cancellation during a Daily Prebuilt call
AQx.name: enable_noise_cancellation_ui

AQy.caption: eject after elapsed
AQy.doc: Eject a meeting participant this many seconds after the participant joins the meeting. You can use this is a default length limit to prevent long meetings. This can be overridden by setting eject properties of a meeting token.
AQy.name: eject_after_elapsed

ARA.caption: advanced chat
ARA.doc: Property that gives end users a richer chat experience. This includes:  Emoji reactions to chat messages, emoji picker in the chat input form and ability to send a Giphy chat message
ARA.name: enable_advanced_chat

ARM.caption: breakout rooms
ARM.doc: Sets whether Daily Prebuilt’s breakout rooms feature is enabled. When set to true, an owner in a Prebuilt call can create breakout rooms to divide participants into smaller, private groups.
ARM.name: enable_breakout_rooms

ARN.caption: shared chat history
ARN.doc: When enabled, newly joined participants in Prebuilt calls will request chat history from remote peers, in order to view chat messages from before they joined.
ARN.name: enable_shared_chat_history
